bug.author: chenjunweii
bug.summary: [cpp-package] op.h got some error when compile
bug.description:
i got some error when i compile op.h, there are some codes in "op.h" set default value like : Shape target_shape = [0,0] and Shape target_shape = [] after i change the code as following, it works, is this problem cause by the script that generate the op.h ? Shape target_shape = Shape (0,0) Shape target_shape = Shape () <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Another Quetions is there any way to change to batch size after binding executor ? it seems reshape function in cpp- package haven't implement . thx

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mxnet-label-bot>@mxnet-label-bot</denchmark-link> add [C++] <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chenjunweii>@chenjunweii</denchmark-link> Does this issue remain with the current version of mxnet?
